TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EnvironmentVariableTarget extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定在 Set 或 Get 操作中存储或检索环境变量的位置。

span.span: Specifies the location where an environment variable is stored or retrieved in a set or get operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举使用的特定重载， ，和方法以指定的位置或目标，其中存储或检索的名称和环境变量的值。The enumeration is used by certain overloads of the , , and methods to specify the location, or target, where the name and value of an environment variable is stored or retrieved. 目标可以是三个位置之一： 与当前进程，为当前用户，与关联的环境变量保留的 Windows 操作系统注册表项或环境为保留的注册表项关联的环境块与本地计算机上的所有用户关联的变量。The target can be one of three locations: the environment block associated with the current process, the Windows operating system registry key reserved for environment variables associated with the current user, or the registry key reserved for environment variables associated with all users on the local machine. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示中创建、 修改和删除环境变量的方法的枚举。The following code example demonstrates the enumeration in methods that create, modify, and delete environment variables. [!code-cpp[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/CS/gsev.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/VB/gsev.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnvironmentVariableTarget Machine = int32(2)

summary.span: 在 Windows 操作系统注册表的 项中存储或从其中检索环境变量。

span.span: The environment variable is stored or retrieved from the key in the Windows operating system registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户在集运算中创建环境变量时，操作系统将存储的环境变量，在系统注册表中，而不是在当前进程。When a user creates the environment variable in a set operation, the operating system stores the environment variable in the system registry, but not in the current process. 如果本地计算机上的任何用户启动一个新进程，操作系统的环境变量将从复制注册表于该进程。If any user on the local machine starts a new process, the operating system copies the environment variable from the registry to that process. 如果在进程终止，操作系统将销毁该进程中的环境变量。When the process terminates, the operating system destroys the environment variable in that process. 但是，用户将其删除以编程方式或通过操作系统工具之前，一直保留在注册表中的环境变量。However, the environment variable in the registry persists until a user removes it programmatically or by means of an operating system tool.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnvironmentVariableTarget Process = int32(0)

summary.span: 环境变量存储在与当前进程关联的环境块中，或者从其中检索。

span.span: The environment variable is stored or retrieved from the environment block associated with the current process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户在集运算中创建环境变量。The user creates the environment variable in a set operation. 如果在进程终止，操作系统将销毁该进程中的环境变量。When the process terminates, the operating system destroys the environment variable in that process.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnvironmentVariableTarget User = int32(1)

summary.span: 在 Windows 操作系统注册表的 项中存储或从其中检索环境变量。

span.span: The environment variable is stored or retrieved from the key in the Windows operating system registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户在集运算中创建环境变量时，操作系统将存储的环境变量，在系统注册表中，而不是在当前进程。When the user creates the environment variable in a set operation, the operating system stores the environment variable in the system registry, but not in the current process. 如果用户启动一个新进程时，操作系统的环境变量将从复制注册表于该进程。If the user starts a new process, the operating system copies the environment variable from the registry to that process. 如果在进程终止，操作系统将销毁该进程中的环境变量。When the process terminates, the operating system destroys the environment variable in that process. 但是，用户将其删除以编程方式或通过操作系统工具之前，一直保留在注册表中的环境变量。However, the environment variable in the registry persists until the user removes it programmatically or by means of an operating system tool.
